column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////Went to this place for lunch with a co-worker and we opted for the restaurants weeks menu (which you probably should do to so you contribute to the Houston Food Bank). We both had the crab cake as first course
column3: excellent dish. Second dish was the ribeye steak
column9: so this is a systematic problem (the ladies in the next table did too). Service and atmosphere were good so I may go back for drinks when I don't have to go back to work
